frame.name: Requirement_scenario
frame.definition:
<def-root>One state of affairs, the <fen>Dependent</fen>, cannot occur without another state of affairs, the <fen>Requirement</fen>, also obtaining. This <fen>Requirement</fen> is construed to be under the control of some implicit force or actor. In an alternative construal, the <fen>Dependent</fen> state of affairs may be presented as depending on the presence of a <fen>Required_entity</fen>. Individual that profit from the occurrence of the <fen>Dependent</fen> state, <fen>Dependent_individual</fen>s, are backgrounded. The same goes for individuals (<fen>Required_individual</fen>) that are required to provide any <fen>Required_entity</fen> or to see to the occurrence of the <fen>Dependent</fen> state of affairs.
The nexus between <fen>Requirement</fen> and <fen>Dependent</fen> can be qualified further in terms of the <fen>Degree</fen> of strength of the link between the two eventualities, the <fen>Place</fen> and <fen>Time</fen> where this nexus obtains, the <fen>Reason</fen> for its existence, or a specification of <fen>Condition</fen> when it applies.</def-root>

FE.name: Dependent
FE.definition: <def-root>The state-of-affairs which cannot hold without the <fen>Requirement</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Requirement
FE.definition: <def-root>The state-of-affairs that must be present or obtain in order for the <fen>Dependent</fen> to obtain.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>The extent to which the <fen>Dependent</fen> depends on the presence of the <fen>Requirement</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Reason
FE.definition: <def-root>The state-of-affairs which militates that the <fen>Requirement</fen> is necessary for the <fen>Dependent</fen> to obtain. </def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which the <fen>Requirement</fen> is necessary for the <fen>Dependent</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Condition
FE.definition:
<def-root>The conditions under which the the <fen>Requirement</fen> is necessary.
<ex>Such care is <t>necessary</t> <fex name="Condition">when under martial law</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Domain
FE.definition: <def-root>The field of endeavor whose nature imposes the <fen>Requirement</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Place</fen> denotes a location in which the specified relation between <fen>Requirement</fen> and <fen>Dependent</fen> holds. </def-root>

FE.name: Dependent_individual
FE.definition: <def-root>The individual in whose interest it is to have the <fen>Required_entity</fen> or for the <fen>Requirement</fen> state of affairs to obtain. </def-root>

FE.name: Required_entity
FE.definition: <def-root>An entity that has to be present for the <fen>Dependent</fen> state of affairs to obtain</def-root>

FE.name: Required_individual
FE.definition: <def-root>An individual that has to provide the <fen>Required_entity</fen> or see to it that the <fen>Requirement</fen> state of affairs holds.</def-root>
